medical_history.history_of_present_illness: The patient presents to the ED with a less than 12-hour history of sharp RUQ pain, which began this morning. She had decreased appetite over the weekend, not associated with nausea or vomiting. No fever, chills, dysuria, constipation, or diarrhea noted. She has never experienced a similar episode before.
medical_history.family_history: No family history of gallbladder disease.
